about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate developer with experience in creating web applications that merge technology with design.
about.whoIAmText1: I'm a 26-year-old developer with over five years of experience in building numerous web applications. Throughout my career, I've had the privilege of working on projects for renowned clients such as BMW, Deutsche Bundesbank, ProCredit Bank, Superlex Switzerland, and Porsche.
about.whoIAmText2: These experiences have allowed me to develop and lead both frontend and full-stack solutions, particularly excelling in technologies like React and Vue.js.
about.whoIAmText3: My passion for development is deeply ingrained—I thoroughly enjoy problem-solving and thrive in both individual and collaborative settings. I have extensive experience leading teams, managing entire projects, and directly interacting with clients to ensure their vision is realized.
about.whoIAmText4: My skillset spans from crafting seamless user experiences to architecting scalable and efficient systems, making me a versatile and ambitious professional ready to grow.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my professional work and achievements.
projects.description: These are just some highlights of the projects I've worked on throughout my career. Interested in more detailed information or discussing specific projects?

ultimateDashboard.title: Ultimate Dashboard
ultimateDashboard.description: Comprehensive HR dashboard application for employee management
ultimateDashboard.detailedDescription: Ultimate HR Dashboard is a comprehensive human resources management application developed using Vue 3 Composition API, Vuex, and Vuetify, with a backend powered by Laravel and MySQL. The application is designed to streamline HR processes, offering features such as vacation booking, a vacation calendar, vehicle reservation, and IT equipment management. My role involved contributing to the development of a user-friendly interface that integrates these functionalities, ensuring seamless data flow and user experience across the platform. The solution has been instrumental in improving HR operational efficiency for our employees.

feedbackPro.title: FeedBack PRO
feedbackPro.description: Application for enhancing user experience with ATMs
feedbackPro.detailedDescription: FeedbackPro is an advanced application designed to enhance user experience and efficiently address issues related to ATMs. It provides users with a simple and intuitive way to give feedback, report problems, and suggest improvements. The aim of the application is to enable faster bank responses to ATM issues, improve customer support, and ensure a better experience for all users.

memberGetMember.title: MemberGetMember
memberGetMember.detailedDescription: MemberGetMember is a revolutionary solution that redefines how banks manage new customers. With a simple yet effective process, it allows banks to easily track and reward users, leading to enhanced service and an increased customer base. Through this program, banks can build stronger relationships with existing customers and encourage them to become brand ambassadors, ensuring continuous growth and customer satisfaction.

bloolaCM.title: Bloola CM
bloolaCM.description: Contract management application with Microsoft Teams integration
bloolaCM.detailedDescription: Bloola Contract Management was an application designed to offer user-friendly contract creation, tracking, and analysis. It was also designed as a Microsoft Teams application and integrated into Teams. It was meant to be used to enhance compliance and operational efficiency for informed decision-making. Together with the team, I helped the client to deliver the app from design to working and functional product.

bloolaFactory.title: Bloola Factory
bloolaFactory.detailedDescription: Bloola Factory was a drag-and-drop solution for creating small web applications without needing prior coding knowledge. As part of the team worked on the frontend part of the Factory app, enabling the client to deliver a stable working solution.

projectPlanner.title: Project Planner
projectPlanner.description: Project management tool for tracking progress and deliveries
projectPlanner.detailedDescription: Project planner is an application that shows an aggregation of all progress/deliveries for ongoing projects, identifies problems, and initiates actions to solve those problems. Clients using the app saw an increase in productivity and decrease in project downtimes.

travelApp.title: Travel App
travelApp.description: Travel planning application with cost calculation
travelApp.detailedDescription: Travel app was a travel planning app, that gave the starting point and destination calculated and presented to the end user all costs of travel, including tolls and other expenses based on the selected method of travel. It also featured cost-splitting functionality.

bmwLearningFinder.title: BMW My Learning Finder
bmwLearningFinder.description: Course discovery platform for BMW Learning Center
bmwLearningFinder.detailedDescription: An application for BMW Learning Center, where users could search courses available on the learning platform, get information about a course, and watch it. Together with the team implemented React frontend solution connected to Sharepoint database.

bdmNetwork.title: BDM Network
bdmNetwork.detailedDescription: BDM Network was a web-based dashboard application that featured adaptable variations based on user needs to deliver a personalized user experience. It was tailored to the needs of the music industry, mainly music producers. Working closely within a small team and with the product owner, we helped the client deliver the app from the design and planning phase to working and stable MVP in under three months.
